product.title: Bubble Tea Plush Slippers
product.body_html:
• Description
  • Cleaning
  • Shipping

  • Keep your feet warm in style

    The Bubble Tea Plush Slippers are inspired by everyone's favourite beverage - bubble tea! They have a unique appearance that is different from other slippers and have a slim silhouette that fits your feet snugly while offering you the comfort of a warm, cozy place to rest your feet! With its slip-on design, this slipper will feel like you are walking on the tea cloud of dreams.

    Inner sole is 26cm / 10in in length - suitable for up to US 9.5, UK 7.5, EU 42

    The perfect gift for your loved ones!

    Our plushie slippers collection makes for the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, and every other special occasion you can think of! You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive their own pair, so leave an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with super soft plushie slippers today. 

    Features

    ✨ Made with 100% premium PP cotton
    💖 Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    😊 Allergy-free and asthma friendly

    Slipper sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-3cm due to the nature of how PP cotton expands and compresses.

  • Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plush slippers in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the slippers in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the slipper has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.


    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
